title: The Tender power
creator_credit: Robert Aller and United States Information Agency
brief_description: Portrays the lives of three typical American women as they participate in the world of work, and the resultant benefits to themselves, their families and the nation’s economy. All have families and are quite active outside the traditiional role of the housewife.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Aller and United States Information Agency
